skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hoover dry
des:
Enter a new world, manage your Hoover appliance in an innovative and bespoke way. You can find the best program to use, ask for advice, send commands or get technical support. 
To use the full features set of Hoover you must have purchased a Hoover's dryer and have created an account using the Hoover Wizard App.

About this skill:
The skill supports the features as available in the Wizard App. Be aware that as home appliance is not part of the Alexa Smart Home program, you’ll need to use “Hoover Dry” as an Invocation Name to activate the skill. It means “Alexa tell Hoover Dry…” or “Alexa ask Hoover Dry…”

To get started:
Register your smart appliance using the Wizard App on your iOS or Android device.
In the App
Tapping on the icon with the four squares at the bottom left, you will find the "User Manual" section to download the guide to register the appliance to Alexa.
If you’re not familiar with the skill, simply start off by saying: 
“Alexa, ask Hoover Dry to what can I ask you? or “Alexa, ask Hoover Dry to know what can I do?”

You can do many things like:
Discover the best program to use simply by saying the type of garment or the type of fabric you want to dry.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Hoover Dry start Eco Cotton cycle!" or “Alexa, ask Hoover Dry how can I dry trousers and t-shirts?”

Know what a specific function or program consists of.
Ask to Alexa: "Alexa, ask Hoover Dry what is the Memo option?" or "Alexa, ask Hoover Dry what does the Eco Cotton cycle do?"

Take care about your dryer.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Hoover Dry when do I have to clean the filters?" or "Alexa, ask Hoover Dry how to clean the tank?"

You can ask questions if you have doubts.
Ask Alexa: "Alexa, ask Hoover Dry where can I install the dryer?" Or "Alexa ask Hoover Dry how do I reduce energy consumption?" Or "Alexa ask Hoover Dry what is the error e03?"

Gimmicks
Try asking Hoover for some strange questions, it will surprise you.
You can say: “Alexa, ask Hoover Dry what does artificial intelligence mean?" or "Alexa, ask Hoover Dry do you like being an assistant?" or “Alexa, ask Hoover Dry you are a nerd!”

Contacts
If you have any questions please contact Hoover Support: Support@candy-hoover.com
